content: **materials ** thread size 10 thread in color of choice small amount hook size 4 boye or 2 mm hook misc size 11 seed beads - 10 beads needed looped needle threader to string beads onto thread **notes** 1 this bookmarker can also be made with pearl cotton size three and a size 1 hook 2 75mm 2 you can adjust the length by the number of chain sts you do just add or subtract as desired
